articles.title: Anti-vaccine disinformation undermining Southeast Asia’s virus response - South China Morning Post
articles.description: People in some of the region’s Covid-19 hotspots like Indonesia, the Philippines and Malaysia are being swayed by the anti-vax movement.

articles.title: Moratorium will freeze formation of new NPLs - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: S&P Global Ratings expects Malaysian banks will continue to be an Asian outlier in their recovery path and the recovery will be further away due to the flare-up of new Covid-19 waves and the inevitable disruptions in near-term economic prospects.

articles.content:
